sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-form
        ref="form"
        v-model="valid">
        <v-dialog v-model="show" max-width="600" persistent>
            <v-card flat outlined class=" mt-2 rounded-0">
                <v-card-title>
                    {{ isEdit ? "Edit Plan Details" : "Enter New Plan Details" }}
                </v-card-title>
                <v-card-text>
                    <v-text-field
                        v-model="edName"
                        label="Name"
                        dense
                        class="rounded-0"
                        outlined>
                    </v-text-field>
                </v-card-text>
                <v-card-text>
                    <v-textarea
                        v-model="edit.editDescription"
                        label="Description"
                        dense
                        class="rounded-0"
                        outlined>
                    </v-textarea>
                </v-card-text>
                <v-card-actions>
                    <v-btn
                        class="ml-2 error rounded-0 text-capitalize"
                        depressed
                        :disabled="!isEdit"
                        @click="delPlan">
                        Delete
                    </v-btn>
                    <ConfirmDialog ref="confirm" />
                    <v-spacer></v-spacer>
                    <v-btn
                        class="grey lighten-1 mr-3 rounded-0 text-capitalize"
                        light
                        depressed
                        @click="close">
                        Cancel
                    </v-btn>
                    <v-btn
                        class="mr-3 success rounded-0 text-capitalize"
                        depressed
                        :disabled="!valid"
                        @click="save">
                        Save
                    </v-btn>
                    <v-btn
                        class="mr-3 success rounded-0 text-capitalize"
                        depressed
                        :disabled="!valid">
                        Copy
                    </v-btn>
                </v-card-actions>
            </v-card>
        </v-dialog>
    </v-form>
</template>

<script>
import ConfirmDialog from '@/components/dialogs/ConfirmDialog'

export default {
    name: 'TestDialog',
    components: {
        ConfirmDialog,
    },
    data() {
        return {
            valid: false,
        }
    }
}
</script>
<script>
import ConfirmDialog from '@/components/dialogs/ConfirmDialog'
export default {
    name: 'TestDialog',
    components: {
        ConfirmDialog,
    },
    data() {
        return {
            valid: false,
            edName: '',
            edit: {
                editName,
                editDescription,
            }
        }
    },
    props: {
        value: Boolean,
        plan: Object,
    },
    watch: {
        value(val) {
            if (val) {
                // this.edit = this.plan
                // console.log('editPlan: ', this.edit)
                // this.edName = this.plan.name
                // this.edit.editName = this.plan.name
                // this.edit.editDescription = this.plan.description
            }
        },
    },
    computed: {
        show: {
            get() {
                return this.value
            },
            set(value) {
                this.$emit('input', value)
            },
        },
        isEdit: {
            get() {
                if (this.plan.id > -1)
                    return true
                else
                    return false
            }
        },
    },
    methods: {
        // save(value) {
        //     this.isEdit ? this.$emit("update-plan", this.dialogPlan) : this.$emit("create-plan", this.dialogPlan)
        //     this.$refs.form.reset();
        // },
        // async delPlan() {
        //     if (await this.$refs.confirm.open("Confirm", "Are you sure you want to delete this record?")) {
        //         console.log('delete it')
        //         this.deletePlan();
        //     }
        // },
        // deletePlan() {
        //     console.log("Record deleted.")
        //     this.$emit("delete-plan", this.dialogPlan)
        //     this.$refs.form.reset();
        // },
        // close() {
        //     if (!this.isEdit) this.$refs.form.reset()
        //     this.show = false
        //     // this.$refs.form.reset();
        // },
    }
}
</script>
